encodingDesc.p: Text encoded in accordance with the latest EpiDoc standards (January 2014)

div.p: [The references are to chapters and verses of Isaiah: occasionally the pages of the notes. and of vol. 1.. are also given.
In the case of words often met with, the appr- oximate no. of times they occur is sometimes given within square brackets: ordinary brackets are used for words not in Α s text.]
σπέρμα πονηρόν, 14 20; σπ. ἄνομον, 574; σπ. ηὐλογημένον, 619 6513
